resources.string: SUHAM stands for Sustainable Healthcare Advancement.It has been incorporated as a Trust on March 30, 2007.

DHAN Foundation,
1A, Vaidyanathapuram East,
Kennet Cross Road,
Madurai - 625016,
Tamil Nadu, INDIA.
Building community and institutions for promoting healthy generations by creating access to affordable healthcare and influencing policies involving mainstream partners.
Centre of Excellence in promoting sustainable community owned healthcare systems.

Excellence Quality work, Quality implementation and reaching Quality outcomes.\n\n

Grassroots action: Working with the community at grassroots towards ensuring quality of life of poor households.\n\n

Collaboration: Working with mainstream health institutions and insurance sector towards addressing the poverty.\n\n

Innovation: Bringing technology and model on quality healthcare at affordability.\n\n

Enabling: building the capacity of governance and empowering the community towards owning the initiatives in a sustainable way.\n\n

Transparency: Bringing clarity among the members and customers.\n\n
